outputs.output_descr: Four outcomes are foreseen in the project document: 1. Systematization and dissemination of knowledge production on the status of MDG achievement and experiences; 2. Civil society, public sector and private sector mobilized, and trained to support the MDGs agenda in the municipalities; 3. Federal Public Policies aimed at to MDGs; 4. Effective implementation of the project.

donor_name: BRA Banco do Nordeste do Brasi
outputs.output_descr:
Despite the excellent progress presented by Brazil so far for the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) as measured by national averages, significant challenges persists when statistics are disaggregated by gender, ethnicity, region showing that an additional effort is needed to guarantee that the MDGS are achieve by all.  The project objective is to contribute to turn the MDGs a reality for all the Brazilian citizens, as a minimum human rights agenda. The project strategy is to coordinate and boost the action of partner agencies regarding the MDGs by production of knowledge with disaggregated data on the progress towards MDGs, monitoring of results, permanent advocacy and mobilization at local level, and capacity development for public management, civil society and private sector to implement solutions that lead to the progress in the achievement of the MDGS in their localities.

Four outcomes are foreseen in the project document: 1. Systematization and dissemination of knowledge production on the status of MDG achievement and experiences; 2. Civil society, public sector and private sector mobilized, and trained to support the MDGs agenda in the municipalities; 3. Federal Public Policies aimed at to MDGs; 4. Effective implementation of the project.
